name: Product Loyalty Overview
description: Metabase dashboard for the product team

native.query: SELECT SAFE_DIVIDE(SUM(CASE WHEN payload.transaction.status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), COUNT(*)) AS conversion_rate FROM finance.transactions_stream WHERE event_type = 'transactions.payment.completed' AND {{date}}
SELECT occurred_at, payload.transaction.currency.code, payload.transaction.amount FROM finance.transactions_stream WHERE event_type = 'transactions.exchange.completed' AND {{date}}
